cta.description: Check how many days you need to reach your goal level.
cta.label: Set a Goal

goal.title: Set a Goal
goal.description: What is the level that you want to achieve?

level.label: Level
level.placeholder: Enter the level you want to reach
level.error: The level must be greater than the current level

result.message: In the last month you did <dailyExperienceHighlight>{dailyExperience}</dailyExperienceHighlight> average XP by day and you need more <remainingExperienceHighlight>{remainingExperience}</remainingExperienceHighlight> to achieve your goal. Doing this XP, you will achieve the level <goalLevelHighlight>{goalLevel}</goalLevelHighlight> in <daysHighlight>{days}</daysHighlight> days.

disclaimer.message: Want to know how many days you need to reach your goal level with a custom experience? Use the <simulator>Experience Simulator</simulator>.

SupportPage.title: Support TibiaRise
SupportPage.message1: Want to support the continued development of TibiaRise? Donate some Tibia Coins to <character>Gui</character>.
SupportPage.message2: Please also send me a letter in game, I really appreciate all support and will be happy to read about your feedbacks and thougts about the project.
SupportPage.message3: Also, feel free to join our <discord>Discord</discord> server and share your ideas and feedbacks with the community, report bugs or anything else. ðŸš€

ExperienceSimulatorPage.title: Experience Simulator

goalLevel.placeholder: Enter the level you want to reach
